channel.title: ECON03SEC1s on econ03sec1
channel.description: Recent content in ECON03SEC1s on econ03sec1

item.title: Module 2: Data Management
item.description: 2.1 Data transformation In this lecture we shall cover: Data transformation: arithmetic operation- addition, subtraction, multiplication, log transformation, exponential, squaring and square root, indices. Along with these topics we shall also discuss copy-paste and transpose cells with an example as an extension/supplement to the earlier lecture. Download the file Pastespecial.xlsx that is used in the video and practice. Exercise: The Mavs.xlsx file contains statistics for the great 2002–2003 Dallas Mavericks basketball team.

item.title: Module 1: Basics of Excel
item.description: We shall use Microsoft Excel 2013 during the course. So I would suggest the class to install the 2013 version in their computers. Go through the syllabus uploaded in the university website. The references are given in the syllabus. In addition, go through the book Microsoft Excel 2013: Data Analysis and Business Modeling by Wayne L. Winston. 1.1 Introduction 1.2 Few other ‘must know’ things before you begin.
